text:
考えろ、スケア…
君の恐怖の根源を
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.63%;top: 51.73%;width: 21.81%;height: 8.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
一度認めれば
君はそれと
戦えるようになる
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 63.56%;top: 53.54%;width: 30.43%;height: 13.44%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 17.39%;top: 72.33%;width: 18.51%;height: 3.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
無理です
ごめん
なさい…
